item.title: Hosting My First Portfolio Website in My Homelab
item.description:
Today is the day I successfully hosted my own portfolio website in my homelab. I started coding my portfolio around three months ago, and it was very difficult for me since I do not have a background in coding HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

The first design of this webpage came from a YouTube channel called How to Web Dev. The creator coded it live, and I manually copied the code from his video. A lot of work, right? ðŸ˜„
